channel.title: Running a server through a website?
channel.description: Is it possible for me to run my server through my website, rsaddict.com? It has FTP and everything that I believe is needed. Can you guys tell me if it is possible and if it is how do I do it?

item.title: Running a server through a website?
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Hi,
I think that will not be too easy. Your server need the support of the java files you have, and you might need a dedicated server. If you got a free host or some host that gives you some space for like i dunno maybe 5$ a month, it aint gonna work.(at least thats what i think). Maybe someone else with some knowledge of webservers on the net can post about setting up a server through the ftp server, since this does also interest me.
Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Running a server through a website?
